metadata.description: Unique id for the scheduled alert rule

properties.description: Detects when email with high risk score was not rejected or discarded by filters.
properties.displayName: ProofpointPOD - High risk message not discarded
properties.query:
let lbtime = 10m;
ProofpointPOD
| where TimeGenerated > ago(lbtime)
| where EventType == 'message'
| where NetworkDirection == 'inbound'
| where FilterDisposition !in ('reject', 'discard')
| where FilterModulesSpamScoresOverall == '100'
| project SrcUserUpn, DstUserUpn
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserUpn
